EmailTemplate.name: ES-2019-03-21-Salt-Lake-City-Invite.ES-2019-03-21 Salt Lake City invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for breakfast at the Grand America, 3/21!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The future is hybrid cloud. Are you ready?
We are hosting an exclusive breakfast and hybrid cloud discussion at the historic Grand America Hotel on Thursday, March 21 and would love to have you join us.
Come hear success stories and learnings from industry-leading IT professionals at the forefront of this transformational journey. You will walk away equipped with answers and principles to implement an effective IT strategy.
When: Thursday, March 21, 2019, 8:30 AM Where: The Grand America Hotel <[[The future is hybrid cloud. Are you ready? We are hosting an exclusive breakfast and hybrid cloud discussion at the historic Grand America Hotel on Thursday, March 21 and would love to have you join us. Come hear success stories and learnings from industry-leading IT professionals at the forefront of this transformational journey. You will walk away equipped with answers and principles to implement an effective IT strategy. When: Thursday, March 21, 2019, 8:30 AM Where: The Grand America Hotel | 555 Main St, Salt Lake City Complimentary valet parking will be provided RSVP: Proven Hybrid Cloud Strategies - Salt Lake City - Turbonomic We hope to see you there!
